replyContent: Hi, yes, all our auto responding apps based on the same design, but have different sets of features. With regards to Auto SMS scheduler - this is different functionality allowing sending texts (or mms) automatically to preset list of recipients at a scheduled time. So you can schedule sending for instance invitation to 200 contacts on certain date.

I tried similar apps in the past, but many do not allow you to add your own messages along with provided profiles for Driving, Busy, etc. But this app allows you to write quite long messages which you can apply to a particular contact, or all of them.  The app is intuitive to use, once the menu icon is selected at the top right of the UI.  I have it installed on an LG G3 running 5.0 Lollipop. So, on the home screen, LG Smart Screen function, advises which contact/contacts have been selected and whether the responder has been activated or not.  This is very useful when the phone is first turned on.  Tests I made with another phone indicate the app works perfectly, and I think  all users of the app will be very happy with it.  I appreciate apps that are well designed, and this one is top notch.
replyContent: Thanks a lot for great review! Just make us happy we have satisfied users!!!
